articles.title: Ex-selector picks Rohit's partner for Asia Cup, chooses between Pant, Karthik - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The former India wicketkeeper-batter picked KL Rahul and Rohit Sharma as his openers with Virat Kohli at number 3. Notably, this was India's top-three in last year's World Cup too where they failed to qualify for the semi-finals.

articles.title: Sultan and family arrive in Singapore for state visit - The Star Online
articles.description: BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN (Borneo Bulletin/Asia News Network): Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah, his consort Raja Isteri Pengiran Anak Saleha Mohamed Alam and members of the royal family arrived in Singapore on Tuesday (Aug 23) for a two-day state visit.
